section.title: Overview
section.para: The ITE is based on the Eclipse development platform, a platform-independent, open-source framework for developing applications.

With the ITE, you can specify, modify, execute and analyse tests. The user interface offers various ways of working, so that you can choose the way that suits you best. You can alter the way the client looks, and the way it behaves. You can work using the menu bar, the tool bar, context-sensitive menus and shortcuts.
